snippet: Investigators have not determined if the motive in the midday break-in was robbery.
abstract: Off-duty New York City Police Officer Rishi Gobin is stabbed by an intruder in his Jamaica, Queens home, and investigators are unsure of the motive for the attack; Gobin, who also suffered a head injury in the incident, is listed in stable condition; in an unrelated incident, Dina Saint-Fleur is arrested and charged with assault after slashing two people and injuring a third during an argument on a rush-hour subway platform in Queens.

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and SARAH MASLIN NIR

lead_paragraph: Investigators have not determined if the motive in the midday break-in was robbery.

headline.seo: Police Officer Stabbed by Intruder at His Queens Home
headline.main: Off-Duty Police Officer Stabbed by Intruder
headline.print_headline: Off-Duty Police Officer Stabbed by Intruder
